website_summaries.verdict: The number one vacuum choice of professional cleaners.
pros: Wider path than other Shark models
Built-in headlights help you spot crumbs and clean in dark places
Includes lift-away canister and many attachments including a pet hair removal brush
Suction power is adjustable based on what you're vacuuming – floors, rugs, or thick carpets
One of the longest cords on the market
Can hold a huge amount of dirt before needing to be emptied
Used by many to clean the interior of their cars
cons: Heavier than most other Shark models

website_summaries.verdict: A great option for those with allergies due to its 3-filter design.
pros: Designed to trap dust and allergens, it has 3 separate filters, including one HEPA filter
The "Lift-Away" feature makes it easy to remove the canister for cleaning convenience
cons: Can be top-heavy and may tip when using the wand

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was delivered on June 21, 2017, and died on August 28, 2017. Nothing happened during the less than 12 times it was used which would have caused it to quit working except for poor quality of the unit. Trying to deal with their customer service was frustrating at best. The worst part is that they stick their customers with paying the shipping costs to replace products that are under warranty. I cannot recommend either the product or the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jacox

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less then 2 months! Not professional! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 months before breaking down, would give it 0 stars. Now got to deal w all the hassle of warranty, shipping and what I didn't think would need to do. It's not a professional vacuum in any way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hp

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is a  joke
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well until the brush roll decided to emit an AWFUL noise upon power up. No problem, we're still under warranty. Well, that part isn't covered. They give you the option to purchase a new Floor Nozzle (the whole bottom half) of the vacuum for the super price of $84 PLUS shipping. Might as well buy a new vaccuum. A Dyson this time.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good vacuum with some shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has a very powerful suction. Some other reviewers found that it was difficult to push this unit while vacuuming. I found that if you back off the suction setting, it is much easier to push with sufficient suction. The pivoting base is a great feature that makes vacuuming easier. There are sufficient cleaning accessories included, however only two can attach to the vacuum at the same time. I agree with other reviews that care should be taken not to tip the unit over as the vacuum is top heavy. Overall I recommend this vacuum as long as the buyer is aware of these shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Ed R.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, incorrect description concerning attachments
customer_reviews.text: Why is Amazon censoring reviews that point out that the product description and photos for this item are not accurate? Please allow other customers to know that this vacuum does include the canister Caddy by not censoring my review. It was not left out of the box, it is a version of the vacuum that does not include it so its not an isolated issue in my opinion. Original review: The pictured canister caddy is not included with this model from Amazon, even the product packaging does not list this attachment, so the description and listing for this item are not accurate, beware. If it were not for the missing attachments I would have given this vacuum 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wright

customer_reviews.title: The Shark Rotator died in less than a month. ...
customer_reviews.text: The Shark Rotator died in less than a month. It made a strange noise when I was using it and the motor cut off and never worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Trina White

customer_reviews.title: I hate vacuuming but now I'm so into it!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this product deserves it! I moved to a new home with hardwood and rugs. It was a mess from construction. I could hardly breathe the dust was so severe. This bad boy, With all the attachments allowed me to vacuum everything from floors to doors, walls, tightest corners! Look at how much it got! Mind you this is after I paid for a cleaning company which vacuumed and shampooed!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Not working with carpet attachment. Instruction said to contact ...
customer_reviews.text: Not working with carpet attachment. Instruction said to contact manufacturer who said to return to Amazon. What a run around..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for 60 days then broke; customer service / warranty is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy vacuum cleaner. The functionality seems very well thought out but unfortunately mine stopped working after 60 days. I contacted Shark and they said they would fix it but I would have to pay for shipping. Sorry, but if something breaks down that quick there was definitely something manufactured wrong on and customer should not have to pay to fix. Updated 3/14/19 Contacted Shark again to process warranty work and I was now informed that I needed a brand new brush head that is not covered by warranty! Since it was only 60 days in they offered me the reduced price of $41.95. Worst product support ever!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Engineer

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of the vacuums. One less than a year ago. Today the vacuum stopped working and we called company. They refuse to honor the warranty. We know it’s the power switch but they will not send us one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Attachments for this vacuum are not available.
customer_reviews.text: You would best try to be happy with the vacuum attachments that come with this vacuum because no additional nozzles are available hat fit. Apparently the company stopped making them since I purchased the same model of vacuum years ago. I bought a bunch of adapters to try to fit additional vacuum attachments but none of the purchased adapters would fit. Also, the wheel base is smaller than the older one, so that the vacuum has the tendency to fall over if not leaned against a wall when not in use... Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Davie

customer_reviews.title: No Suction to be had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year after a lot of research and was horribly disappointed. I only got to use it once where it worked properly. The very next few times I attempted to use it I had no sign of any suction to be had. And the warranty is a joke you have to pay to send it back to the company and then again pay to have a replacement sent to you. No suction and a crap warranty I refuse to ever buy a shark vacuum ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Earl

customer_reviews.title: bad batch ... I got one
customer_reviews.text: This was my second shark of the same model. With this one I was having issues with the roller brush right from the start but attributed it to the new carpet and the new vac; unfortunately when the issues persisted ,I decided to call shark customer service, I was told the roller brush would cost me almost $50 to replace ( keep in mind that the brush never worked properly to begin with). I would not recommend this product and sharks customer service has gone completely down hill since the first time I purchased. Several reviews indicate the same thing ... looks like a defective batch got through and nobody wants to be accountable. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kljourney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction and worked well for our house with hardwood, carpet, kids, and pets. That said, the rotator brush was difficult to clean and clumped with hair. After a couple years of working well, things started to fall apart. The hose cracked and I patched it with duct tape. The cord was wrped and tangled and became brittle so it was almost impossible to untangle. A wheel fell off. Pretty soon, the whole thing was patched and not performing and we tossed it after 3 years. It should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like I was vacuuming for the first time!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I did my rugs using the power brush feature, it was like I had never vacuumed before. The amount of dog hair and dust that came up was thrilling and disgusting at the same time. I’ve had the vacuum three weeks now, and I ho early look forward to vacuuming. We have two cats and a dog, and I can’t say enough about how much dust/dander it gets out of the rugs. Works great on my hard wood floors too. I purchased this model primarily fit the rubber coated wheels so that my hardwood floors wouldn’t get damaged, but it’s the ability to clean rugs so well that led me to writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! I have had this vacuum for six ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! I have had this vacuum for six months. It worked well until today when the wand would not release. There was nothing in the manual addressing this problem so I called the company. The representative told me that I would need to mail back the vacuum and send $19.95 for shipping and they will send me a new one. Not only is this a heavy item, but since I cannot break it down it is very large. This would be a costly return for me all because their product malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.author: Kush

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!!!  No caddy, no power pet brush...not what they say it is!
customer_reviews.text: This product description shows a vacuum with a caddy and a power pet brush. What you get is a product that does not come with those things. This is obviously them luring you in with a vacuum that fits your needs, but shipping out something else, hoping you don’t notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor gave out in one month!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after only having it a month. The motor wont even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: a. Laun

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The product worked perfectly well three times. On the fourth time it never turned on. I called Shark and followed the service representatives instructions to try to get it to turn on and was unsuccessful. They will exchange for a new one for $19.99. When I attempted to return the item through Amazon, it doesn't allow me to exchange for the same product and the Vacuum is now much more expensive. It is very upsetting I now have to invest another $19.99 when the system stopped working on its own and I really like the vacuum cleaner and would like to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2-1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum until the brush stopped working. It’s my understanding that Shark will not honor their warranty. I will update this review if I can get them to replace the broken part. I purchased the vacuum in October 2015 so it’s only been 2-1/2 years. Should not have broken because I take excellent care of Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Terry C. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. This was advertised to include a canister caddy. It does not. I am very disappointed! Called Amazon and as always they are very helpful. UPS will pick up and Amazon will send a replacement, and HOPEFULLY, this one will come with all the advertised accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and I used my old one
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived 2 days early. It was easy to put together and I used my old one, one last time and then ran the Shark Rotator. It was disgusting how much dirt was on my floor I had no idea was there. I know brand new vacuums always work better but this was just amazing. It even worked well on a high shag carpet. I picked up at least 2 cats worth of fur from the carpet and the bin was half full of dirt. We were LIVING ON THAT! GROSS! I would highly recommend this vacuum cleaner to anyone that wants to feel cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I have own three Shark vacuums and this one is by far the biggest disappointment. It worked awesome at first. However, after three months, there is no suction despite being taken apart, inspected and cleaned. There is nothing in the filters. The vacuum now smells like something is burning. It also now makes a high pitched squeal almost when powering down, once the off button has been pushed. I’m pretty sure it’s too late to return. I’m fairly annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Fortitude

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I’m really sad to be writing a negative review, because this vacuum really does work well. However, after 5 months, the vacuum has totally died. I clean the filters regularly and have completely replaced them once. All airways are thoroughly cleaned bi-weekly. I’m not sure what caused the vacuum to stop working, but the lights turn on, and the vacuum will not. After researching the issue it seems to happen often and it can be a variety of problems. Seems that nothing is made to last anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Burton

customer_reviews.title: The BEST thing I have purchased in YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this vacuum! All plastic, but good quality, and easy to assemble. I was blown away at what this sucked up out of my carpet the first time I used it. I has just vacuumed 4 days prior with my old vacuum, and I was amazed, shocked and disgusted at the same time :) My old vacuum was doing nothing, and I didn't realize how weak it had become. I will recommend this vacuum to everyone that asks about a vacuum. The suction power is incredible. It pulled and fluffed up carpet that had been flattened for a long time. Just an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Strickland

customer_reviews.title: wife and it's a great vacuum with power to spare
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my petite,but by NO means a wimp, wife and it's a great vacuum with power to spare; however, it's so heavy that she has a tough time with it and is very tired after cleaning a room or two! Her second negative is that the power chord is on the right side of the unit as if engineered by a left-handed male. This makes it extremely difficult to manage and operate the unit with the "RIGHT HAND" ! Otherwise, it would rate five (5) stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Joehorse

customer_reviews.title: Want a super duper picker upper? Don't hesitate, get this
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to all the prior reviews! This vacuum is amazing, I must have turned into my mother because the amount of dog hair and debris it picks up on what I thought was an otherwise pretty clean wool carpet excites me...i want to vacuum everywhere!! Dont hesitate, get this. Ps I had a Kirby, Dyson and hoover previously ....none of them had this much suction power, or variety of tools. Plus its pretty light and nimble. Dont like the colour as white gets dirty fast but otherwise no downside so far.......
customer_reviews.author: Cazza

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever had. I replaced e my old vacuum of which I'd used in my living room just a few days before and efter vacuuming the living room and bedroom areas I had to empty the dirt container. That's how much dirt it picked up my old vacuum was missing. My mom liked ours so much she had me get her one. Not too loud and light enough for my 74 year old mom to use easily. I have 4 big dogs and this vacuum grabs hair off the floor like nothing I've ever seen. Works good on carpet and hard floors alike. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love the swivel head and the easy to clean dirt bin
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Shark. I love that the swivel is so flexible that I can lay the entire vacuum down and the head stays flat so I can get completely under the bed. I've never before been able to clean entirely under the bed from one end to the other. It's awesome! And it picks up way more dirt than my old vacuum. My place has never been so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Russo Whylly

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet and very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I ever own, the suction is powerful, the dust all gone, it works perfect with no complaint. I bought one at a thrift store 2 yrs ago and it work great, until now. So I decided to buy a brand new one. I know for sure, you will not regret buying this vacuum, I don't I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carcamo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vacum But Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this vacuum I was worried about spending to much money on a vacuum but not getting enough out of it. This vaThis vacuum comes with many unique features like, * easily removing trash from canister, & * taking vacuum apart & puting back together for unclog or using lift away feature. * sturdy & easy to maneuver * comes with additional accessories for particular areas The only downside is that this vacuum is not light weight as advertised. But for waht it is capable of doing, it is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums well, but cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: I had another pro version before this, but I ended up having the same problem as other people...the unit cracked in half at the pivot point. The ability to vacuum is very good. But this new version I purchased seems more cheaply built. And the added attachments do not stay on well in the hold clips while vacuuming as they would fall off while the unit was in use. I think the upholstery attachment works well and is motorized. The characteristic that I don’t understand at all is it’s ability to turn into some kind of canister vacuum. The containment unit detaches, but what use is it if it can’t vacuum? It’s a strange feature.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.4 star because its heavy at the handle.
customer_reviews.text: I Received it just now and couldn't wait to use it. PICKS UP alot(I have a pet) and ,aparently.It isn't loud and seems pretty good ,based on what it picked up.It is only my first day so im not sure yet how i feel about it.IT IS VERY HEAVY THOUGH.Im not tired today but ,on the days that I am,I don't know that I could vacuum.I normally do it daily but considering its heavy I don't think I will be so willing on a daily basis.Well see.It's all i can say for now.
customer_reviews.author: Z3powerF

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of months. I have 2 bad shoulders and wrists. My other vac. was heavy and a literal P.A.I.N. I LOVE this vac. It handles easily and does a fantastic job on carpet, rugs or hardwood floors. The attachments work great also. The embarrassing thing is that I cannot believe the amount of dust, dirt that comes out of my carpet and rugs....OR my other vac was just doing a crappy job! I like the lift-away canister too. I can vac. cobwebs or spiders around the windows without straining my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY PERFECT DESIGN AND POWER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I’ve bought so far off amazon and I’ve bought five in the last few years. It was at a cheaper price than Target, and I really love it. It’s got a heck of a lot of power, awesome pop out wand, simple attachments so even my husband can figure out how to use it without having a meltdown. On off brush roll, easy to keep clean and between two cans, one a Maine coon who gets litter trapped all the time, a dog, a nine year old, and a construction worker, I REALLY love this vacuum!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: Never seen anything like this.
customer_reviews.text: 6 months old and think I need a new belt, normaly this is an easy fix but not with this Shark. It takes special bits and I dont mean star, hex or any thing like that these are some kind of security bits. After finding the correct bit and removeing 8 of these well hidden special screws 2 roller wheels and 2 philips head screws I still can NOT open because you will need the same bit but a 3 inch long one to fit in to the long narrow hole. SHAME ON YPI SHARK!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacumn
customer_reviews.text: Have a yellow lab that I call the fur ball. Also live in mountains so track in leafs & pine needles. Oreck was just not working so researched many vacumns including on consumer reports (which didn’t give this product the high grade which it deserves .)After 2 uses, dust bin was full. This vacumn works amazingly well at picking up pet hair, dust, dirt and “stuff”. Haven’t used attachments yet, but seems to be very versatile. Well worth the money simply as floor vacumn and rest is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: jhawk1966

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to take apart and clean, intuitive to use
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum not only sucks up hair and dirt most effectively, but it's easy to take apart in order to clean it, remove clogs, etc. The features are simple to figure out. The swiveling head and light allow me to clean narrow spaces without having to remove the wand. Stair cleaning is simple. The whole thing is light and portable. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum, one issue
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark Rotator. It's the best vacuum I have owned. I have one complaint. Two of the pictures show a roller base for using the vacuum as a pull-around, but this part was not included. The pull-around is not mentioned in the text describing the machine, so that's in their favor. But showing a part in the main set of pictures that does not actually come with the machine is not okay. Again, great vacuum, but be aware that parts are shown that are not actually included.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I've had many vacuums over the years, but this one takes the cake. It sucked up so much debris that my other vacuum missed.. and I thought my other one was fine. My whole room just smells fresh after using. It all fits together nicely.. well thought out design. The filters are washable, so don't buy new ones to have on hand... likely you won't need them for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a home with several dogs and this is the only vacuum I will buy. It never seems to lose suction unless it’s super long human hair gets tangled in the brush on the bottom front but it’s an extremely easy fix. It’s light weight and durable. This is my second shark and the only reason why I had to buy another is because my own fault of damaging the first. I highly recommend to anyone to buy a shark they won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: FAN-SUCKING-TASTIC!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using our 17 yr old canister HEPA vacuum one to three times a week. We have a dog (who sheds like crazy in Spring) and felt our vacuum just wasn't working all that great to pick up all of our dog's hair, plus we wanted a vacuum with better ability to clean hard floor surfaces. So, we recently got this bad boy and...WOW! Great suction power!! We also just moved into our place a couple months ago, and feel like all the carpeted areas are now clean of all the yuckiness embedded by previous residents. We're extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. It was inexpensive and works great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've had a few vacuums in my time, and most of them have all been trash! This thing is awesome. It was inexpensive and works great. Easy to use, easy to clean/empty. It has headlights....what else could you want! It has many functions and can be taken apart quickly and easily. I can say it isn't really a super high end vacuum, it seems like it was made pretty "economically", but that's okay. I've been using it for about 2 months, and am very happy with it. It outperforms other vacuums I've had that were hundreds of dollars. I would buy again, although I don't think I will need to for now.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I rescue dogs. I currently have 9 in the house. The Shark is, hands down, the best. I was told to try a Bissell. I did. It was horrid. The suction was just bad and the dirt container was small
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Very decent for light home use.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Sucking power is incredible... - decent noise level - air coming out is incredibly clean and doesn't blow dust everywhere - very easy to dump out and clean Cons: - Motorized floor brushes are weak and bog out on even bathroom rugs - All the removable parts on this transformer make it all feel a bit rickety and wobbly - to use the "lift away", you have to unwind the whole power cord which is pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It's a great vacuum. I like that the handle itself is the extension wand, I find that more practical than keeping extenders around. The suction path is well designed in my opinion, isn't as complicated and prone to spots that might leak as some other brands are. The best part, I have allergies and like to be able to clean out my vacuum inside. I have done this with several others and this vacuum is by far THE EASIEST to take apart and clean out. I can simply open both ends of the dirt container with no tools and hose it out in my kitchen sink. The filter is easy to rinse out too, it's just a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS UP DIRT, HAIR AND DUST AMAZINGLY WELL!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best vacuum on the market! It picks up dirt, dust and dog hair like I've never seen before. Even when I think I'm done vacuuming, I've been going over a carpet one more time and still get more "junk" out of it. Plus, it works on stairs (has a specific tool that comes with motor to do it, tall places, hard-to-reach places and all with the use of some of the tools that come with it. The only thing they could do to improve this is to have the cord automatically zip back into the body of the vacuum, thus relieving me from having to gather it up and wind it around the pegs provided.
customer_reviews.author: Norwegiandogmom

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the right attachments
customer_reviews.text: So I have bought this vacuum again because I love mine for my house so much and I just started a cleaning business- the hard floor attachment didn’t come with it this time like it did last time and I ordered from the same link and everything. Also the caddy doesn’t come with it either like it shows in the pictures. Don’t know what happened here- but y’all need to change the pictures because it’s false advertising on which attachments you get. Also previously I paid about 180 for it and now it’s 220 and you don’t even get all the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey B.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: used it for 2 weeks thinking it was a good vacuum. Then realized there is a suction setting on the handle. 🤦‍♀️ should have read the manual lol. This is a great vacuum. Works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya W

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I analyzed and re-analyzed vacuums for months before finally pulling the trigger. I wanted suction. I needed options. Husband wanted us to use a shop vac for standard use, yeah no. I wanted portability. I asked myself: do I bite the bullet and pay $500 for the single most crucial indoor cleaning product that might last me a decade? I want to LOVE my vacuum so much that I get excited to turn it on and suck up the disaster trail the kids and pets leave behind. I'm happy to say this vacuum is meeting all my expectations and more!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how great this thing works!
customer_reviews.text: After having to return my Dyson because it isn’t “compatible” with my carpeting (Dyson’s words), I decided to try this vacuum for half the price, but with just as great reviews. I am so happy I made the switch as this vacuum works great on my carpets and hardwood floors, alike. I’m really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: A.E.H.

customer_reviews.title: I read all the great rave reviews about this product but once I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great rave reviews about this product but once I got to put it to use I was very displeased... I though it would easily vacuum my apartment but its incapable of getting up all of the dust and dirt on my hardwood floors and I have to go over each area at least 3-4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Good, but have a few concerns.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a fantastic vacuum and does a far better job than any other mfg. I have ever tried. I do, however, have a few concerns about the vacuum. The wand sticks a bit when I try to detach it, and I have to wiggle-pull it in order to get it off. Also, there's a lot of heat produced (or maybe just hot air) when I use it. I've never experienced this before, and have never read anything about this in a review. The last Shark I used, an in-laws, never did this.
customer_reviews.author: yanelle

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! After doing a ton of research I finally landed on this Shark. Having 4 cats and two dogs, vacuuming daily is a necessity and our stick vacuum just wasn't cutting it. We have hardwood floors with large rugs and it works great on both! It is easy to maneuver and our carpets just look cleaner. I love being able to take the canister on the basement stairs to clean up cat litter instead of sweeping it all over the place. It is heavier than I'm used to but that does not bother me. Im hoping it lasts a long time! Also, shipping was SUPER fast considering I did not go through Prime
customer_reviews.author: Chelsers987

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a small cleaning business and there is no vacuum like this one! It converts from carpet to hardwood floors, you can turn the brush roll on or off, xl dust cup, suction is awesome. I've had mine for 2 years and just bought another for back up! Very tough, washable filters!! It also came with several attachments. One being the hardwood attachment. Its truly worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and strong
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! So smooth and light weight. I vacuum at least 2x a week and I love how easy it is to empty. To detach the top and clean the stairs or ledges is simple! Super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Siss

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Our household consists of 3 adults, 2 large dogs, 2 cats and 3 parrots. And we live on a farm. This vacuum is awesome. It does a great job on both carpet and bare floor. The lift off feature allows immediate use of the crevice tool or brush for doing under furniture, baseboards or dusting book cases. Best of all - NO BAGS. That means big money savings plus the instant gratification of seeing how much dirt you just removed from your house. We will buy a second one soon to use upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Placid Lane Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Had an older version of this and got this when I broke the old one. Still love it for versatility. The only complaint I have is that it falls over when you extend the hose too far, like when getting underneath furniture. It’s fallen on me a couple of times and hurts! But otherwise a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good power!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was going to buy a Dyson, but I was waylaid by the reviews for this one. I decided to give it a try, and am pleasantly surprised. It really does vacuum up!! The fluff in this is now a pink (from the carpet) as opposed to just white (Dyson), so it's getting loose threads from the carpet that the Dyson did not get. Now, I do worry that my carpets will all be thread bare in a few years, but I will worry about that when I get to that point!
customer_reviews.author: AngloAustrian

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 thing I don't like
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Shark because we have moved to all wood floors, but I still have some wool area rugs. This vacuum has worked great, it fills up quickly with the new shedding wool rug, but it's easy to empty and it pretty seamlessly moves from rug to wood floors. Here's my only problem - the Hoover that I've had for the last 8 years or so had a retractable cord! Retractable cords are so much better than the kind you have to wind yourself! So, if the Rotator had a retractable cord it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ai

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I tested the product the very first day. My house usually takes ~4hrs to vacuum. I actually spent 3hrs with new unit and house was perfectly clean. Great high quality product. Easy to use, user friendly design. It is very convenient to use in hard rich areas.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: It also turns off whenever it feels like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned SO MANY vacuums, this was the most expensive and it gets clogged way more than any other one I’ve owned (after every use). It also turns off whenever it feels like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie T

customer_reviews.title: User-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty well thought out.You can easily change from upright to lift away, re-attach everything. Easily switch from bare floor to carpet, adjust suction, cord is wonderfully long! All of the attachments are actually useful as intended. Dirt cup release, wand release all work great. In lift away mode on bare floors it will follow you around so you don't have to carry it. Only issues I have are, the crevice tool will fall out of it's storage spot occasionally & there is nowhere to put the floor attachment for the lift away mode on the central vacuum. Nothing I can't live with. After 2 attempts at another manufacturer's product, I love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Best Vaccuum Cleaner Out There (and I've had many)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum cleaner. I have 3 (one for each floor). It's so easy to use, has so many attachments and the suction is incredible. I've had Dyson vacuum cleaners in the past (3 of them) and I feel these are 90% better at half the cost. Very light and I love the light they have in the front (it shows a LOT of my dust bunnies that I usually don't see). Very happy with this vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kemes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Multi-Level & Various Floor Types
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this purchase. We have a multi-level home with a mix of hardwood, rugs and carpet. The detachable canister makes it easy to carry (and it's not hard to carry without detaching). The cord is extremely long and reaches from room to room. The many attachments will get anything done that you might need, especially the extra wand attachment for carpet or bare floors. This even got up hard-to-get glitter from Christmas decorations! Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Can handle a cattledog!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Light, great maneuverability and a long cord - it's really nice not having to shuffle the cord around to a different outlet every 10 feet. We have a heeler and if you have one, you know that they are shedding machines. This vac handles it all very well. My only complaint about this vacuum is that the exhaust air is really hot. Granted we live in a small place, but it fills the room with hot air which is not fun in the summertime with no Air Conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Three accessories, not five
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum arrived with three tools (not five as in description and not two as shown in the manual), not all of which can be stored on the vacuum, which is an issue as an accessory can be mislaid easily,
customer_reviews.author: OlanaDL

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I am a carpet installer for 27years now.I have been through somw vacuums. from eureka vacuums to Kirby vacuums. The shark vacuum here by far takes the prize. Hands down...So amazed all the features. Makes my job so much easier and better looking. Shark hit it out of the park on this one. I will and do recommend it to everyone.and as an Installer people tend to take my advice more. but im usually showing it off so they know how awesome it is before I even leave the job. im sure ive made some sales for you shark vacuum co.. A+++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Dsno

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little while to write a review about this product. This vacuum has been a life saver, it's been great!!! I have tile through most of my house and with 5 cats liter travels. This actually picks up the little liter, I was so amazed! I have a few areas with rugs and I was amazed at the amount of cat hair and dust it got out of those rugs. I even got my Fiance to vacuum. This has been one of my best purchases. I was definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: christy canaday

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THE PRODUCT & SHARK - the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work out of the box. It came with a dead motor. I contacted the manufacturer and it had been 45 days since I purchased it. Even though it had never worked, they wanted me to pay $20 for shipping. Terrible customer support. If that is how customer support is with a new customer, I don't want to know how they treat customers with an older product. AVOID THIS MANUFACTURER!
customer_reviews.author: L. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Shark! Adios Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made and cool vacuum! Not like that's all I look for in a vacuum. I don't have any pets, but I do have a toddler. This Shark out performs my Dyson that had several holes in the cheap hose. Not only the holes in the hose, but a broken head and another broken piece. I don't foresee any issues with this Shark. The price was not even close to as high as the Dyson. I really love all the cool attachments and the suction adjustment feature. I have high pile carpet so the Dyson was about impossible to push. Buy a Shark!
customer_reviews.author: MJ South Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum shocks you along with poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I received this vacuum. It had a lot of great features and seemed to work really well, except for the fact I was being shocked. The handle has a piece of metal exposed, that shouldn't be. I received confirmation from the company that it is not suppose to be that way, but since I didnt buy it directly from them, they wouldn't do anything to fix it. I exchanged it through amazon, twice. A total of 3 vacuums, all with the same piece of metal exposed to continuously shock me when i use it. Do NOT purchase this! Unless you enjoy being shocked...
customer_reviews.author: bmilesjr34

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Vacuum Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shark rotator vacuum. I have had several shark vacuums but hands down this is my favorite one. It works great and lasted a long time until my puppy decided to chew the cord. I bought another shark duoclean to replace it but I didn’t like it as much. My puppy again chewed the cord and I repurchased the rotator. I’m so happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING!!! Be aware, the description online states and shows pictures that claim you are getting the following: Shark Rotator Professional Lift- Away, Dusting Brush, 1 2-Inch Crevice Tool, Canister Caddy, Premium Pet Power Brush, Wide Pet Upholstery Tool, Straight Suction tool HOWEVER you only will receive 3 attachments as shown on the box top in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: As described great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this vacuum although I could not read durability as we've only been using it about 4 weeks but so far so good.. I will say I'm very impressed with how well it works on tile floors.. great suction.. I love how this vacuum has suction from the middle of the base instead of off to one side like most vacuums.. we bought this vacuum right after the Kirby guy came and did a demo and believe this vacuum does everything the Kirby does almost just as well for a fraction of the price. not excited that the main belt is not replaceable without replacing the whole head but we'll see how long it lasts?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kurek

customer_reviews.title: So good it will disgust you.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and 2 pets plus 3 humans. I received this vacuum today it assembled quite easily and I decided to use it on our bedroom carpets. I did 2 passes on an area of about 20x20 and filled the cannister 3 times. I probably could have done a few more passes (and may tonight). The first 2 cannisters were filled with hair my previous vacuum could not pick up apparently. The last cannister was filled with dirt my last vacuum could not pick up. It honestly left me a little disgusted at how much dirt had been sitting on my carpet. This is a great vacuum. A little heavy for stair use, but a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Dominelli

customer_reviews.title: Works well, all attachments not included.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with the mobile caddy or the brush detailed in pictures when ordering. Would love to know where I can get those or how much they’d add to overall cost. Works very well as a vacuum, the pics included are me running over an area that my old vaccuum(bissell) has already ran over once. Amazing that much was left for this to get, well worth the money and works almost as well as my dyson that just died, at half the price. Will update review for the longer run, I use it about three times a week for cat and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is perfect for baby boomers!
customer_reviews.text: The N501 Shark Rotator Professional is impressive and worth the cost. For those of us who are getting older, the placement of all buttons and controls is perfect...you only need to bend to wrap the cord. All buttons and controls are knee high or higher. The convenience of the lift off short handle or longer handle-plus are perfect and easy. The quality is excellent. The suction is brilliant. Shark has chosen to control suction power rather than adjust brush height...perfect!! I have had a multitude of vacuums over the past 42 years...and this is the best, bar none. The only upgrade I could recommend to Shark would be to include an automatic cord winder. Then it would be 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum...bad deal!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum for our daughter because we like ours so much. When our daughter got hers, it didn't have the hard floor attachment or the 4wheel caddy for the canister, even though it showed them in the images of a woman happily vacuuming a hard floor with those attachments. Now Amazon says 'oh no this vacuum doesn't come with those pieces. I feel deceived.
customer_reviews.author: matthew r hunt

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Dyson it replaced!
customer_reviews.text: Our Dyson was finally dying, but we couldn’t justify the high cost of a new one. We tried getting a refurbished Dyson and that was a disaster. So we went looking for something similar from other brands and after reading other reviews here, decided to give this one a try. We have loved our Shark hand vac and Ninja blender, so we were hoping this would be good as well. Fortunately, it is! The suction is great, it maneuvers as well as the Dyson Ball, and it is actually easier to empty the bin! The wand is also easier to use and the attachments work as they should. Three months into using it weekly and we could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Newcomb Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Truly good with pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: I've been through about 5 vacuums that were supposedly for pets but always kept getting clogged up when I used them on pet hair. This one works great and doesn't clog up. Near perfect. I wish that the canister was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Turek

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this vacuum because my mom has the same one and I liked hers so much. It comes with plenty of attachments. The best part is the canister disconnects from the body of the vacuum so you can carry it around instead of dragging it with you. The only thing I noticed on my moms (which is several years old now) is the hose clear, ribbed hose has holes in, probably from multiple wear. I'm sure you can replace that somehow. LOVE this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Better than fancy $500 dyson I'd been using before.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Better than fancy $500 dyson I'd been using before. Honestly had no idea how great and easy this design would be and have been loving it. I'm not going to say vacuuming is fun...but I'm still pleasantly surprised each time by how this vacuum gets the job done. I usually have to vacuum one handed with my toddler in my other arm and it's not a problem with this vacuum, even when I need to pop out the wand and use it for hard to reach high places and ceilings. White and red is as cute as you get get too, for a vacuum!)
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction power and fantastic for baseboards and stairs. As far as the hair cleaning feature, it's no less or better than every other vacuum I've had in the price range. My wife and 2 girls have long hair, and I've had to cut out the hair stuck to the rollers twice in the last month. Otherwise, the "Lift Away" feature is very convenient, and I'm glad I sprung for the larger capacity dust canister.
customer_reviews.author: James Ford

customer_reviews.title: Motor blew after 8 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in July and didn’t use it until October. It quit working after 8 uses , motor for hot and stopped. My house is very clean. I live alone and have 1 cat. I had a shark before and LOVED it but this one didn’t hold up with very mnimal and very light use. Canister was only needed to be dumped 1 time. I am in contact with shark now in hopes they make it right. If they do I will Change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: I clean for a living and won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark Professional vacuum and I love it! I clean houses for a living and want everything close at hand and easy to use with as little bending over as possible. The lift away as well as the wand release make using the attachments very easy to use. I also wash my canister and filters very frequently and they have held up very well. I use this on hardwood and all carpets heights and it works well on both. I use my vacuum several hours every day and it lasted a whole year. That's a lot of vacuuming, transporting and washing in a year. I won't use anything but a shark!
customer_reviews.author: B cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Initial reaction/review is very positive
customer_reviews.text: I won't hesitate to update this review after we've used the vacuum longer, but our initial experience has been very positive. The unit is much quieter than the Eureka we had previously, and the wheels haven't scratched our hardwoods. Suction is very strong (and, contrary to some comments, adjustable with tools). It's maneuverable, to the point of taking some getting used to. The Lift-away feature has been useful on both stairs and for doing "spring cleaning" of kitchen cabinet-tops. All in all, we understand the high rating in CR.
customer_reviews.author: CaryBoomer

customer_reviews.title: Only works temporarily
customer_reviews.text: Purchased August 7th... now it's October 2nd and and it won't turn on. Tried multiple outlets and it's the vacuum, not the power source. I'm diligent about cleaning filters and using it only in my home (not abused for commercial use).
customer_reviews.author: loganluvsmommy

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty intimidated by number of attachments
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was pretty intimidated by number of attachments, but the instructions make for an easy setup. Maneuvering the vacuum is not difficult. The suction is strong and as of 6 months, only diminished after the filters becoming dirty. Once I replaced the filters, the suction went back to being strong. The filters lasted about 4 months, but keep in mind, I live in a fully carpeted townhouse with two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Review after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this just a year ago this month. This has been a great vacuum! Very easy to use! We rescued a dog about 6 months before we bought this vacuum. She sheds a lot! This vacuum does a great job on hair. Very easy to use on the stairs. Last week I noticed the hose was splitting right below the handle. I called shark and told them about the hose. No problem, they said. We will ship you out a new part. Three business days later the new part arrived. The only negative thing I can say is I wish the cord was longer. But that is a very minor thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction heavy duty vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with the canister caddy as shown and stated. So thats a downside. Very bulky and heavy vacuum, Truly an upright vacuum because you cannot use the lift away feature without changing it into a different head. I previously had the power rotator lift away so that's what I'm comparing it to. These are the only cons when it comes to comparing it, when it comes to the suction of this vacuum and power, it blows the rotator lift away out of the water. For the deal I got I can't complain, and will be keeping the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Brady

customer_reviews.title: I had this vacuum for a month and it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this vacuum for a month and it stopped working completely. Even after cleaning out the entire thing, it still didn't work. For spending as much money as I did on this, I expected it to work longer than 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F

customer_reviews.title: Motor died within first month
customer_reviews.text: Died 1 month in. Our last one held for al ost 3 years. This one lasted one month and the motor died. Seeing now that the motor is not covered under warranty. Will NEVER buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: But somewhere deep down inside I feel like this is something we will continue to enjoy using ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this..? It does it all. I use it to vacuum my wood floors, car, couch, bedroom carpets, pet beds, upper corner cobwebs...It has attachments to do all those jobs! I thoroughly enjoys this vacuum. We've only been using this for around two months, so it might be too early to see where this is going. But somewhere deep down inside I feel like this is something we will continue to enjoy using years to come. I have used Bissel and Hoover and didn't have the same feelings from the beginning. So hopefully that says something...
customer_reviews.author: Welshman

customer_reviews.title: Best multi-purpose vacuum owned to date!
customer_reviews.text: Cold wooden or laminate floors to vacuum in the winter was a miserable task with our old vacuum. The static electricity was our enemy as our old vacuum just pushed the dog hair and dust around without ever lifting it. I would have to vacuum and the sweep right after. But now, the shark rotator vacuum has made it a breeze! I actually enjoy vacuuming again. The vacuum is amazing in carpets and makes it look professionally cleaned. Then just hook up the wood floor attachment and boom, the squeegee band allows the dog and and dust to move straight to the sucker part and in one swipe the floor is spotless. Best vacuum to own. Hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Raven1

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacuum I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever had. I have been Dyson loyal for about 15 years and the last Dyson was just bad. I always purchased the top pet model available for each Dyson and they have just gone downhill since the original. So, I decided to branch out and try this. I read the reviews and it sounded like a good option. I have now had it a couple months and it works so great. I love the detachable bottom, so I can carry up my stairs to vacuum them. Great suction. I'm sold on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Woldt

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bagless vacuum cleaner and the different ways you can release parts of the vacuum to clean nooks, crannies and furniture. The only reason I gave it a 4 instead of 5 stars is because the head is a bit small and takes more swipes to get your room clean. Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good vac for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several weeks now and quite like it. The bag less bin is exceptionally easy to remove and empty,which is a big plus. It's very maneuverable and light enough for almost anyone to handle. Suction seems good, with an easy one button switch between hard floor surfaces and carpet. My only quibble, and the reason for 4 stars instead of 5, is that it doesn't get quite as close to baseboards and the edges of furniture as my previous vac. You have to switch to an attachment to get into those areas, which isn't difficult, but is less than perfectly convenient.
customer_reviews.author: MarileeTop Contributor: Weaving

customer_reviews.title: Horrible reliability
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dyson vacuum before the shark that lasted me six years and the shark I’ve had less than a year and it’s already lost most of its suction power. Website says that you can order new parts for it but nothing about a warranty to replace it which is crazy so unless they replace this vacuum I will definitely never be by in a shark product again
customer_reviews.author: ryan fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but short on attachments
customer_reviews.text: The older NV501's came with a roller pet hair attachment plus caddy for 5 attachments according to the questions I looked at but apparently the newer one's only come with 3 attachments which is why I only gave it 4 stars. It's a great vacuum, couldn't believe how much more pet hair it picked up compared to my old one. I will order the pet hair attachment to do my furniture from there website. My son has a Shark with that attachment and they love it for furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CRA

product_meta.title: Shark Rotator Professional Upright Corded Bagless Vacuum for Carpet and Hard Floor with Lift-Away Hand Vacuum and Anti-Allergy Seal (NV501), White with Red Chrome
product_meta.description: A lightweight 2 in 1 Lift Away upright vacuum. With the push of a button, Lift Away technology allows you to easily clean in hard to reach areas. This vacuum's nozzle has LED lights and Advanced Swivel Steering for excellent visibility and control when maneuvering around furniture. It has an XL capacity dust cup and completely sealed system with a HEPA filter to trap dust and allergens.
feature_bullets: Dust cup capacity 1.3 quarts. Powerful upright vacuum with lift away pod for convenient cleaning of stairs and above floor areas
Rotator technology enhanced swivel steering and better deep carpet cleaning
Lightweight & ultra quiet operation. Hose length (ft.): 8.4
Premium pet tools and ergo cleaning accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,454 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 12" Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Wide Upholstery Tool
